snippet.title: Hikikomori No Chuunibyou - Trailer
snippet.description:
Available here: https://blazeepic.itch.io/hikikomori-no-chuunibyou

Hikikomori No Chuunibyou is a pseudo 8-bit platform-adventure game with beat-em-up, puzzle, and stealth elements.  With its storytelling directing the player through open-ended levels, each stage is progressed using parkour-like abilities and martial-arts techniques.​

Features:
• Parkour-inspired platforming
• Open-ended levels with story-focused progression
• Beat-em-up, puzzle, and stealth elements
• Unlimited continues and frequent checkpoints
• 8-bit graphics and soundtrack
• Supports Xbox 360 Controller (recommended)

Like all of my other games, I had developed it entirely on my own as well as having had composed the soundtrack by myself.
